scripts.build:android: export NODE_ENV=production && sleep 2 && npx expo prebuild --platform android --clean && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd ..
scripts.build:android:dev: export NODE_ENV=development && sleep 2 && npx expo prebuild --platform android --clean && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd ..
scripts.build:android:preview: export NODE_ENV=preview && sleep 2 && npx expo prebuild --platform android --clean && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd ..
scripts.build:ios:dev: export NODE_ENV=development && sleep 2 && npx expo prebuild --platform ios --clean --no-install && sh ./ios-custom-build.sh dev
scripts.build:ios:preview: export NODE_ENV=preview && sleep 2 && npx expo prebuild --platform ios --clean --no-install && sh ./ios-custom-build.sh preview
scripts.build:ios: export NODE_ENV=production && sleep 2 && npx expo prebuild --platform ios --clean --no-install && sh ./ios-custom-build.sh Production
scripts.ios:preview: yarn ios:prebuild:preview && NODE_ENV=preview npx expo run:ios
scripts.ios:prod: yarn ios:prebuild:prod && NODE_ENV=production npx expo run:ios
scripts.ios:dev: yarn ios:prebuild:dev && NODE_ENV=development npx expo run:ios
scripts.android:preview: yarn android:prebuild:preview && NODE_ENV=preview npx expo run:android
scripts.android:prod: yarn android:prebuild:prod && NODE_ENV=production npx expo run:android
scripts.android:dev: yarn android:prebuild:dev && NODE_ENV=development npx expo run:android
scripts.ios:preview:release: yarn ios:prebuild:preview && NODE_ENV=preview npx expo run:ios --configuration Release
scripts.ios:prod:release: yarn ios:prebuild:prod && NODE_ENV=production npx expo run:ios --configuration Release
scripts.ios:dev:release: yarn ios:prebuild:dev && NODE_ENV=development npx expo run:ios --configuration Release
scripts.android:preview:release: yarn android:prebuild:preview && yarn clean:android && NODE_ENV=preview npx expo run:android --variant Release
scripts.android:prod:release: yarn android:prebuild:prod && yarn clean:android && NODE_ENV=production npx expo run:android --variant Release
scripts.android:dev:release: yarn android:prebuild:dev && yarn clean:android && NODE_ENV=development npx expo run:android --variant Release
scripts.android:dev:build: yarn android:prebuild:dev && yarn clean:android && NODE_ENV=development yarn build:android
scripts.android:preview:build: yarn android:prebuild:preview && yarn clean:android && NODE_ENV=preview yarn build:android
scripts.android:prod:build: yarn android:prebuild:prod && yarn clean:android && NODE_ENV=production yarn build:android
scripts.local-check: yarn lint && yarn eslint-fix && yarn pretty && yarn types && yarn spelling
